name: Strange cards
description:
very early concept, there is not much gameplay

click ok]n card to play them and selecrt a space.

press space to draw

press W to see board


*redacted entity* wants to play a card game, if you lose you die! how fun.

You played a few card games before, but these are just multiple games mixed?! how will this work?! What do these cards even do?!
